description: Manage Filo's commands by enabling or disabling them.

enable.description: Enable a Filo's command or category.

target.name: target
target.description: Specify what you want to enable.

value.name: value
value.description: Name of the command or category you want to enable.

disable.description: Disable a Filo's command or category.

target.name: target
target.description: Specify what you want to disable.

value.name: value
value.description: Name of the command or category you want to disable.

docs.description: Get the link of the disable commands module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the disable commands module.

reset.description: モジュールの設定を元に戻す (データの復旧はできません)。

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
